name: SpacePlace
description:
FULL PC SUPPORT WILL COME! 

As of right now, if you're playing on PC treat the game as if you're running an android emulator. Your mouse is your finger. Click to touch! 

The game is in early access. If you come across any bugs. Please let me know! To exit the game on PC press ALT + F4 If you're playing on a mobile phone the game takes some time to load at first. Please allow the game to load. 

Please join the discord if you have any questions LINK TO DISCORD https://discord.gg/zamCsAnH

Thanks for everything! Enjoy!
